titleStmt.title: Some reflections upon a treatise call'd Pietas Romana & Parisiensis, lately printed at Oxford to which are added, I, A vindication of Protestant charity, in answer to some passages in Mr. E.M.'s Remarks on a late conference, II, A defence of the Oxford reply to two discourses there printed, A.D., 1687.
titleStmt.author: Harrington, James, 1664-1693.

notesStmt.note: Written by James Harrington. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
